member.name: F:RestSharp.Serializers.NewtonsoftJson.JsonNetSerializer.DefaultSettings
member.summary: Default serialization settings: - Camel-case contract resolver - Type name handling set to none - Null values ignored - Non-indented formatting - Allow using non-public constructors

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.NewtonsoftJson.JsonNetSerializer.#ctor
member.summary: Create the new serializer that uses Json.Net with default settings

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.NewtonsoftJson.JsonNetSerializer.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Create the new serializer that uses Json.Net with custom settings

member.summary: Use Newtonsoft.Json serializer with default settings

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.NewtonsoftJson.RestClientExtensions.UseNewtonsoftJson(RestSharp.IRestClient,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Use Newtonsoft.Json serializer with custom settings

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.NewtonsoftJson.RestRequestExtensions.UseNewtonsoftJson(RestSharp.IRestRequest)
member.summary: Use Newtonsoft.Json serializer for a single request

member.name: M:RestSharp.Serializers.NewtonsoftJson.RestRequestExtensions.UseNewtonsoftJson(RestSharp.IRestRequest,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
